content: this is a free pattern for a hat/cap/beanie/toque with rapid decreases in the crown for a contemporary look i have made this hat many many times as donations to the ships project 1 read about all of this on my blog www nonsuchknits blogspot com 2 the pattern is written for an average adult head with instructions for knitting in the round or flat with seaming it s the perfect stash-buster project as you can use any worsted weight yarn or even a dk yarn that has some loft or fluff like alpaca **additional sizes ** **small child** - co 68 sts **child** - co 76 sts **small adult** - co 80 sts 1 http //www theshipsproject com 2 http //www nonsuchknits blogspot com
